dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sh.shipment_xid sh_xid, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM/DD/YYYY') sys_date, loc_buy.location_name buyer_line1, loc_buy.city || DECODE(loc_buy.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_buy.province_code) || DECODE(loc_buy.postal_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_buy.postal_code) buyer_line2, cc_buy.country_name buyer_line3, loc_vsl.location_name vessel, TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc_sh.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') -- The time zone of start_time depends upon the source location s_date, loc_sh.location_name shipper_line1, loc_sh.city || DECODE(loc_sh.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_sh.province_code) || DECODE(loc_sh.postal_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_sh.postal_code) shipper_line2, cc_sh.country_name shipper_line3, sh.total_weight || ' ' || sh.total_weight_uom_code || ', ITEM COUNT ' || sh.total_ship_unit_count quantity, sh.total_weight || ' ' || sh.total_weight_uom_code total_wt FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN location loc_sh ON sh.source_location_gid = loc_sh.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc_buy ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc_buy.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc_vsl ON sh.servprov_gid = loc_vsl.location_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc_sh ON loc_sh.country_code3_gid = cc_sh.country_code3_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc_buy ON loc_buy.country_code3_gid = cc_buy.country_code3_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_NUM AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(sh.shipment_xid,'Data Missing in System') sh_xid, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'MM/DD/YYYY') sys_date, NVL(loc_buy.location_name,'Data Missing in System') buyer_line1, loc_buy.city || DECODE(loc_buy.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_buy.province_code) || DECODE(loc_buy.postal_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_buy.postal_code) buyer_line2, cc_buy.country_name buyer_line3, NVL(loc_vsl.location_name,'Data Missing in System') vessel, NVL(TO_CHAR((FROM_TZ(TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_CHAR(sh.start_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS PM'),'GMT') AT TIME ZONE loc_sh.time_zone_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY'),'Data Missing in System') -- The time zone of start_time depends upon the source location s_date, NVL(loc_sh.location_name,'Data Missing in System') shipper_line1, loc_sh.city || DECODE(loc_sh.province_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_sh.province_code) || DECODE(loc_sh.postal_code,NULL,NULL,',' || loc_sh.postal_code) shipper_line2, cc_sh.country_name shipper_line3, NVL(sh.total_weight || ' ' || sh.total_weight_uom_code || DECODE(sh.total_ship_unit_count,NULL,NULL,', ITEM COUNT ' || sh.total_ship_unit_count),'Data Missing in System') quantity, NVL(sh.total_weight || ' ' || sh.total_weight_uom_code,'99999999') total_wt FROM shipment sh INNER JOIN location loc_sh ON sh.source_location_gid = loc_sh.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc_buy ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc_buy.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc_vsl ON sh.servprov_gid = loc_vsl.location_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc_sh ON loc_sh.country_code3_gid = cc_sh.country_code3_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc_buy ON loc_buy.country_code3_gid = cc_buy.country_code3_gid WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_NUM AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

WITH v_table AS (SELECT glogowner.xxscou_nap_packing_list_pkg.xxscou_main_fcn(:P_SHIPMENT_NUM) footer FROM DUAL) SELECT SUBSTR(footer, 1, INSTR(footer,'|',1,1) - 1) container, SUBSTR(footer, INSTR(footer,'|',1,1) + 1,INSTR(footer,'|',1,2) - INSTR(footer,'|',1,1) - 1) item_desc FROM DUAL, v_table WHERE :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT SUBSTR(footer, 1, INSTR(footer,'|',1,1) - 1) container, SUBSTR(footer, INSTR(footer,'|',1,1) + 1,INSTR(footer,'|',1,2) - INSTR(footer,'|',1,1) - 1) item_desc FROM (SELECT glogowner.xxscou_nap_packing_list_pkg.xxscou_main_fcn_draft(:P_SHIPMENT_NUM) footer FROM DUAL) WHERE :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'
